title: 9/1 - Ultra Modern 2 Bed/2 Bath w/ Exposed Brick + Cent AC in Allston!
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 303053718', 'Rent: $3,095 / Month', 'Beds: 2', 'Bath: 2', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Pet: Cats Allowed', 'Rent Includes:: Electricity, Gas, Heat, Hot Water', 'Parking:: street parking', 'Available for Sept 1st!', 'The unit will be cleaned and painted between tenants.', '(The rent includes ALL UTILITIES (Heat/Water/Gas/Electricity/Central A/C)', 'Gorgeous!', 'Ultra-Modern 2 Bedroom/2 Bath with Exposed Brick located in a quiet, and professionally managed building on Brainerd Road in the heart of Allston, steps to Commonwealth Ave and Harvard Ave.', "Located on the Brookline line, with easy access to the B Line at Harvard Ave Station, the 66 Bus Stop, and it's a short walk to Coolidge Corner, Brookline.", 'This apartment features soaring high ceilings, exposed brick interior, beautifully renovated kitchen with white cabinets, quartz counters, full-size stainless-steel appliances including dishwasher, disposal, and built-in microwave.', 'There is an open concept living and dining room area with exposed brick, recessed lighting, freshly painted walls, newly refinished hardwood flooring, and central heating/cooling.', 'There are two fully remodeled bathrooms with modern accents and a quartz countertop.', 'The rent includes ALL UTILITIES (Heat/Water/Gas/Electricity/Central A/C. There is laundry in the building.', 'The building and common areas have been renovated to reflect the modernity of each unit.', 'There are two laundry facilities on the first floor, which are easily accessible from your unit.', 'The building is cat-friendly, and there is off-street parking available behind the building for $200+/Month.', '- Professionally Managed', '- Exciting Allston location close to numerous restaurants and entertainment!', '- Central Cooling and Heating (Thermostat Controlled)', '- Elevatored Building', '- Cat-Friendly', '- Laundry facilities in the building (Mobile Pay)', '- Car sharing is available from Zipcar, Enterprise CarShare, RelayRides and Hertz On Demand.', '- Free parking for non-residents on Brainerd Road as well as the side streets', '- A residential parking permit will allow you to park anywhere in Allston/Brighton', '- Off-street parking available for $200/month behind the building', '- The rent includes ALL UTILITIES!', '(Heat, Hot/Cold Water, Electric)', 'Subway Lines', 'B-Line (GREEN) - Harvard Ave. (0.1 miles)', 'C-Line (GREEN) - Coolidge Corner (0.66 miles)', 'Bus Routes', '66 Bus Harvard Ave & Commonwealth Ave (0.1 miles)', '57 Bus Brighton Ave & Chester Ave. (0.27 miles)', '64 Bus Cambridge St & Hano St (0.46 miles)']
